about_gif_selected_frames.message: For select or deselect the frame, click on the frame by the left mouse button. For select (deselect) multiple frames, click at the starting point, then hold down the SHIFT and click at the end point of the desired segment.

add_blocked_video_tags.message: Add tags separated by commas, to block videos

adv_msg_content_1.message: The app is free, they live off the views.

adv_msg_content_2.message: Disabling recommendations leads to they will "starve".

application_description.message: More comfortable video watching on YouTube. No adverts, GIF, screenshots, mouse control of the sound, blacklist..

blocked_video_tags_label_id.message: The tags of blocking of the videos

do_you_want_to_delete_this_channels_from.message: Do you want to delete this channels from black list

first_adv_clever_for_youtube.message: How to fill tags correctly in couple clicks?

hide_viewed_videos.description: Пункт в меню для скрытия просмотренных видео

insert_string_of_copied_channels.message: Insert channel names or links separated by commas

only_sound_text_on_video.message: YouClever -  "Only sound" enabled. Saving of internet traffic up to 90%.

sd_advertising_blocked_text.message: “Blocked advertising” removes banners and annoying flashing images. And video ads, which appear at the beginning of the video and you must wait until it finished

sd_advertising_blocked_title.message: Does advertising bother you? How blocked them.

sd_annotations_blocked_text.message: Check “Block annotations” and nothin will distract you while watching video

sd_autoplay_blocked_text.message: Function “Block autoplay” — each opened video are on pause. Playing begins only after clicking by “Play”

sd_blackchannels_toggle_text.message: Remove useless - look interesting! "Black List channels" can be viewed in the settings and you can restore the desired channel back.

sd_blocked_blackchannels_video_text.message: Some one threw down the link to the video, and the channel with this video is in your blacklisted .. Do not waste any second to watch - "Block the video from the black list". Especially useful if your computer use multiple users.

sd_design_toggle_text.message: On the page of video, the click by logo YouClever changes design of the page into tv format. Comments will be on right, and recommended videos will be under main video

sd_gridsearch_toggle_text.message: Twice as many videos on the screen, thanks to the "grid" list.

sd_gridsearch_toggle_title.message: More videos on the search page

sd_logourl_text.message: Tge click by YouTube logo opens any link, which is selected by you  :)

sd_only_sound_text.message: Internet traffic savings of up to 90%. Select "Only sound" in menu of extension and clicking by YouClever icon causes "Only sound" mod.

sd_open_new_window_text.message: Switch between programs or even turn off the browser - the video will be always in front of you. For activation, click by the logo "YouClever" on video

sd_open_new_window_title.message: Video on top of other windows

sd_recommendation_toggle_text.message: One video appears in the recommended. Look it necessarily.

sd_save_time_toggle_text.message: «Save time-code» opens video with a last second viewing, even if you watched this video yesterday.

sd_save_time_toggle_title.message: Where was I? At what second?

sd_screenshot_toggle_text.message: Set video quality in the settings, and click on the icon "Make screenshot". Remember,  higher quality of the video leads to the larger screenshot

sd_smartfullscreen_toggle_text.message: Now not necessary to expand and  to collapse video each time. Enough not to move the mouse during selected time and the video will be played back on the full screen.  Collapsing is even easier - one mouse movement

sd_smartfullscreen_toggle_title.message: Video on the entire screen after a few seconds

sd_smartpause_toggle_text.message: “Pause in new tab”: you changed the tab - auto pause on previous tab. Back to the tab and video plays again.

sd_smartscroll_toggle_text.message: “Video during scrolling” shows video in pop-up window, when you read comments

sd_smartscroll_toggle_title.message: Comments and video in same time!

sd_subtitles_translate_toggle_text.message: Select "Autotranslation of subtitles" and each video will become clear

sd_videoquality_text.message: You start the video and the picture is not clear. Blame Youtube, it plays video in poor quality, although the higher quality is available. Choose what quality you like, but remember: the higher quality leads to the more traffic.

sd_videoquality_title.message: Does video quality not suit you?

sd_wheel_mouse_volume_text.message: Point cursor on video and roll the scroll wheel

second_adv_clever_for_youtube.message: «Clever for Youtube» picks up tags and copies them. And it ..

settings_checkbox_blocked_blackchannels_.description: Отключени/включение блокировки видео из черного списка
settings_checkbox_blocked_blackchannels_.message: Block videos from black list or by tags

settings_checkbox_open_new_window.message: Logo YouClever - opens in new window

tooltip_channel_to_black_list.description: Тултип для иконки добавления каналов в черный список

tooltip_delete_video_from_subscription.description: Тултип для удаления видео из подписок

tooltip_in_new_window.description: Тултип для иконки открытия видео в новом окне
